biography_one: Martyna Zych is one of the most talented young conductor in Poland. Her great passion is Czech music, she is the only one conductor in Poland who has manuscript to Antonín Dvořák Symphony No. 4 in d minor op. 13 due to cooperation with Antonín Dvořák’s Museum in Prague. She wrote a consistent amount of works about Antonín Dvořák and Bedřich Smetana. Her aim is to conduct with the composer’s truth, therefore she conducts with manuscritps, letters, traditions and the history of Czech.
quote: Her maturation, although still nearing completion given her young age, is very fast and I am sure that in few years she could achieve very significant results.
about_content: Martyna Zych is very go-getter, energetic and full of passion conductor. During the work she is industrious, precise and indictable person. She speaks English, Czech and Polish.
